title: George C. Marshall Commemorative Coin Act of 1994
content: George C. Marshall Commemorative Coin Act of 1994 - Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to issue one-dollar silver coins with the likeness of George C. Marshall in commemoration of the 50th anniversary of the end of World War II and General George C. Marshall's service. Directs the Secretary to pay all surcharges from such coin sales to the Friends of George C. Marshall to be used solely for the construction of the George C. Marshall Memorial and Visitor Center in Uniontown, Pennsylvania.
